bibl.title: Menander's Dyskolos and Demetrios of Phaleron's Dilemma: A Study of the Play in its Historical Context - The Trial of Phokion, the Ideals of a Moderate Oligarch, and the Rancour of the Disfranchized.
bibl.seg: Wiles David, Menander's Dyskolos and Demetrios of Phaleron's Dilemma: A Study of the Play in its Historical Context - The Trial of Phokion, the Ideals of a Moderate Oligarch, and the Rancour of the Disfranchized.
